definition: li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
one in a hundred/cream of the crop
lit. ninety li is merely a half of a hundred li journey (idiom)/fig. the closer one is to completing a task, the tougher it gets/a task is not done until it's done
pinyin: xing2 bai3 li3 zhe3 ban4 jiu3 shi2

sentences.chinese: 大明虾｜盘煎，香蒜，百里香，柠檬。

sentences.english: eg: She's one in a million.
TASTING NOTES : Aromas of thyme, rosemary and other herbs typical of the "garrigue"(Mediterranean scrubland) can be detected in the bouquet.
sentences.chinese: 气味带有百里香，迷失香和地中海灌木丛香气。

sentences.english: The northern part of Liaoning Province lies to the south of Kerqin Desert of Inner Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 辽宁北部处于内蒙古科尔沁沙地“百里翰海”的南缘。

sentences.english: Discard the cinnamon, thyme and bay leaves.
sentences.chinese: 去掉肉桂，百里香和月桂树叶。

sentences.english: Bromoc-resol Green and Phenolphthalein-Thymolphthalein were selected as indicators.
sentences.chinese: 选择溴甲酚绿和酚酞一百里酚酞为指示剂。

sentences.english: Then, one visit in Balixia is equal to the purification for lungs.
sentences.chinese: 所以说，进一次百里峡，您就相当于洗了一次肺。

sentences.english: Add chopped thyme into the marinate and mix well.
sentences.chinese: 之后加入少许切碎的百里香，搅拌均匀。

sentences.english: Geralt first meets him outside the Rosemary and Thyme.
sentences.chinese: 杰洛特首次遇见他是在迷迭香和百里香外面。

sentences.english: Ninety miles is only half of a hundred miles journey.
sentences.chinese: 行百里者半九十的英语说法是什么？

sentences.english: A preliminary survey of the genus Rhododendron L. of "Hundred Li Rhododendron" region in Guizhou.
sentences.chinese: 百里山杜鹃地区杜鹃属的调查报告。

sentences.english: Bought her and her little wench, Prissy.
sentences.chinese: 买了她和她的小女儿百里茜。

sentences.english: Mr Weston is such an excellent man.
sentences.chinese: 韦斯顿先生是百里挑一的人。

sentences.english: Then throw in the garlic and scallions and sprinkle the thyme over the chicken.
sentences.chinese: 然后放入蒜和葱，并在鸡块上撒上百里香。

sentences.english: Add the wine, mint or thyme, salt, and pepper.
sentences.chinese: 加入干白，薄荷或百里香，盐，胡椒粉。

definition: a thousand miles/a thousand li (i.e. 500 kilometers)/a long distance
Wanli township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
Lianyun district of Lianyungang city 連雲港市|连云港市[Lian2 yun2 gang3 shi4], Jiangsu
continuous/unbroken/uninterrupted/extending forever into the distance (of mountain range, river etc)
(literary) the vast sky/(finance) eventual downturn/poor prospects in the long term
continuous (esp. of mountain ranges)/to stretch long and unbroken/a continuous link/sostenuto (sustained, in music)
Dragon mountain/Longshan district of Liaoyuan city 遼源市|辽源市, Jilin/Longshan county in Xiangxi Tujia and Miao autonomous prefecture 湘西土家族苗族自治州[Xiang1 xi1 Tu3 jia1 zu2 Miao2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1]
